txt.en: 'The tea from the leaves you brought me was exquisite [placeholder]. Unfortunately, I have used them up and will not be able to make any more without a fresh supply.\n\n'If you would venture out again and collect more of the leaves, I would gladly make you another batch of tea.'
'These leaves look perfect, [placeholder]. I look forward to sharing another brew with you.'
'Gather more holly-leaves, [placeholder], and I will make more of that tea for you.\n\n'You should speak with me again when you have gathered enough.'
Celebrandir in Gwingris has offered to make you more holly-leaf tea if you bring him enough leaves.
Bring the leaves to Celebrandir in Gwingris
Holly leaves can be found at the bases of holly-trees in Pend Eregion.\n\nYou should gather more holly leaves and bring them to Celebrandir in Gwingris.
